Repackages Windows app for Linux

Related repos

  • Desktop environment for Linux distributions
  • Renders Windows applications as native Linux windows
  • Streamlines Windows installations, debloats, and tweaks
  • Native Windows UI for Claude Code without WSL
  • Run Windows applications on Linux as if they were native
  • Debian distribution for single-board computers
  • Desktop app marketplace for discovering and installing Claude Desktop extensions
